sentences.en: As soon as he'd finished eating, he excused himself.
sentences.cn: 他一吃完就告辞离开了。

sentences.en: Eating in East Berlin used to be a hazardous and joyless experience.
sentences.cn: 在东柏林就餐曾经是一件危险而且沉闷无趣的事情。

sentences.en: He had survived by eating a small tin of fruit every day.
sentences.cn: 他靠每天吃一小罐水果活了下来。

sentences.en: He supplements his regular meals by eating between meals.
sentences.cn: 他在两餐之间吃点东西来补充正餐。

sentences.en: I myself enjoy cinema, poetry, eating out and long walks.
sentences.cn: 我本人喜欢电影、诗歌、外出吃饭和远途散步。

sentences.en: I sometimes feel uncomfortable after eating in the evening.
sentences.cn: 我晚上吃完饭有时会觉得不舒服。

sentences.en: I was eating ham and Swiss cheese on rye.
sentences.cn: 我正吃夹火腿和瑞士干酪的黑麦面包。

sentences.en: Is Karen still eating you out of house and home?
sentences.cn: 卡伦还在只顾吃光你的家当吗？

sentences.en: My interests: eating out, fun nights in, music and laughter.
sentences.cn: 我的爱好是：到外面上馆子，晚上在家娱乐，听音乐，寻乐子。

sentences.en: Parker could have customers eating out of his hand.
sentences.cn: 帕克能让顾客对自己言听计从。

sentences.en: Rot is eating away the interior of the house.
sentences.cn: 房子内部正逐渐受到侵蚀。

sentences.en: See just how much fat and cholesterol you're eating.
sentences.cn: 看看你究竟摄入了多少脂肪和胆固醇。

sentences.en: She rinsed her hands quickly before eating.
sentences.cn: 她吃东西以前很快洗了一下手。

sentences.en: She usually has the press eating out of her hand.
sentences.cn: 她通常都能将新闻界抓在自己手心。

sentences.en: Those people are concerned only with eating,sleeping and procreating.
sentences.cn: 那些人关心的只不过是吃饭、睡觉和生孩子。

sentences.en: Wages were rising faster than productivity and this was eating into profits.
sentences.cn: 工资的涨幅高过了生产率增长的速度，从而消耗了利润所得。

sentences.en: We all left off eating and stood about with bowed heads.
sentences.cn: 我们都停下不吃了，低着头闲站着。

sentences.en: We don'tlike paying through the nose for our wine when eating out.
sentences.cn: 下馆子时，我们不喜欢在酒水上花很多钱。

words.tran_cn: 侵蚀的；可生食的；进餐用的

trans.tran_cn: 吃，喝，吃饭（ eat的现在分词 ），（食物）吃起来感到，咬，（人）感到苦恼（或烦恼）
